item.title: Gabriel and Sebastian Shemirani’s sister Paloma was diagnosed with cancer. Seven months later, she died - having refused chemotherapy. The brothers blame their mother’s anti-medicine conspiracy theories for Paloma’s death. Kate Shemirani has not responded
